name: ProvaLingua
overview:
ProvaLingua provides tools for fast and effective language learning. The flagship product, ProvaLingua Desktop, is a free Windows application providing grammar drills for several languages, as well as drill tools for vocabulary. If you don’t use Windows, or if you’re frequently on the go with an iPhone or iPad or other mobile device, they also provide ProvaLingua Mobile, which offers the same familiar vocabulary drills and can synchronize with the desktop version.

The tools are intended for serious students of languages, who will use them in combination with a texetbook or course approach. ProvaLingua tools can help you build and maintain a large repertoire of vocabulary over your lifetime using your target language, ensuring you frequently review key words. Whether you are first learning a language or want to stay sharp, ProvaLingua can help.
